title: How to Make Miso Vinaigrette

steps.headline: Place all of the ingredients into a clean jar.
Shake well to combine all ingredients.
Pour directly onto the salad.
steps.description: If preferred, the vinaigrette can be poured into a sauce boat or similar server to allow diners to serve themselves individually.

text: Place all of the ingredients into a clean jar. Put on the lid. Shake well to combine all ingredients.  Pour directly onto the salad. If preferred, the vinaigrette can be poured into a sauce boat or similar server to allow diners to serve themselves individually.
